casebody.data:
Elmer B. JEFFRIES, Appellant, v. Sam L. GROSS, U. S. Marshal for Northern District of Texas, Appellee.* Circuit Court of Appeals, Fifth Circuit. November 14, 1927. No. 4971. W. B. Harrell, of Dallas, Tex., for appellant. *1015Norman A. Dodge, U. S. Atty., Arnold Davis, Asst. U. S. Atty., and J. Forrest McCutcheon, Asst. U. S. Atty., all of Fort Worth, Tex., for appellee.

Before WALKER, BRYAN and FOSTER, Circuit Judges.

Rehearing denied December 20, 1927.

 PER CURIAM.

The order appealed

from is affirmed.
